About Me

I'm a graduate student in the Cancer Biology PhD program at Stanford University. I'm co-adivsed by Michael Angelo and Christina Curtis. My research focuses on combining multiplexed imaging and -omics techniques to understand the interaction between tumor and immune cells in breast cancer.
